messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Legal issues in California and unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Hello Margaret  What I would do is to file as a private school. Then enroll my children. You get the most freedom this way. Here is where you can get more
messages.messageBody:
Hello Margaret
 What I would do is to file as a private school. Then enroll my children. You get the most freedom this way. Here is where you can get more info:
http://www.hsc.org/faqs.php
I hope this helps you.
Monica

--- On Mon, 4/26/10, MargaretC <museec@...> wrote:

From: MargaretC <museec@...>
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Legal issues in California and unschooling
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, April 26, 2010, 8:23 AM
















 









Hi -



I'm trying to figure out how to unschool and satisfy school district so I don't get in trouble for kids truancy.



Can anyone point me in the right direction?



Thank you!






























[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
